content.question: Which of the following changes can be made so that the code segment works as intended?

choices.label: Changing line 1 to String[] names = new String[4];
Changing line 1 to String[] names = new names[3];

content.answer: Changing line 1 to String[] names = new String[4];

skill.text: 3.D: Explain why a code segment will not compile or work as intended and modify the code to correct the error.
